captions.text: It’s time for
WONDERFUL ADVENTURE NOW KOREA
The Coffee Prince redemption edition!
For those of you that are new to Eatyourkimchi
You may not know this but we have
An epic failure ray
Every time we try to go to the Coffee Prince House
One year ago we tried to go
To the one on the mountain and
We wound out getting lost
In the middle of the forest on Halloween
and we almost DIED.
I want to go to the right,
I want to walk away from the howling dogs
Me too
I just want to see my mom again.
And before that we tried to go to
The one in Hongdae which is like
Right at the street from us
”What could possibly go wrong?”
Batteries died last week and
We couldn’t finish our WANK
Don’t bother coming to this Coffee Shop,
They won’t let you take photos and
They won’t let you make a video.
This time we’re going to get this thing right.
KIA’s nice enough to let us borrow a car,
We’re gonna type in the navigation system
Where we are going,
It’s gonna tell us turn by turn exactly
Where to go and how to get there.
So we cannot fail this time,
We’re determined to go.
Are you ready Simon?
SUCCESS
NANANANANANA
Okay so thing’s seems to have
Gotten off to a bad start already
Seems like we’re already doomed because,
We parked the car somewhere and
We don’t know where the car actually is
I think we’re just on the wrong level.
Maybe it’s on B4.. or B1A4.
B1A4 do you have our car?
I THINK WE SHOULD JUST ABORT THE MISSION
EVERYTHING’S GOING TERRIBLY WRONG!
GET A HOLD OF YOURSELF SOLDIER!
Found it Simon!
We got it!
Whew
.. I mean... everything was fine from the gecko.
Buam-Dong 97-5
Crank some sick tunes!
Is your phone connected?
HAHAHAHAHAHA!
Seriously?
OH!
BADUMBAUBADUMBAU
BADUMBAUBADUMBAU
BABABABABABABABAA
PAPPARATPAPAPAPAPA
Pau Pau
*awesome music*
We’re going right..
Were are I’m going right?
Just keep on going straight
I’ll tell you when to turn right.
HERE?
Oh
OH GOD
We said left here, not U-turn here.
Oh my god Simon
Yeah, this is it, turn right here.
This is like a 70° angle
Oh my god
We’re going up
So looks like we turned the wrong way.
Are you serious?
I’m serious.
Ducky, there’s all these kitties in the bushes
What if they’re wild kitties
and they’re trying to eat us?
Hello kitties
Going straight still?
Straight, keep on going straight.
Straight where?
Oh shit. We should have turned left.
SIMON
So where am I turning right?
Am I turning right here?
I don’t know, I legitimately don’t know.
I think we should go left, I think we should go left.
OOOH Straight again..
OH MY GOD
This is the exact street we walked down
There is a sign from the god that says:
Stay the hell away from Coffee Shop
This is two! Alright two times
That we’ve been scolded by destiny.
No.
Oh yeah we’ve definitely been here before.
How am I supposed to do this?
Is that around the corner?
THAT’S AROUND THE CORNER!
We have arrived at the destination
Guys,
We’re almost there,
We are seriously almost there.
We finally made it.
That’s right.
They have a tiny sign out now
It’s such an old drama, no one cares
I CARE OKAY!?
It’s just as I remember it
First time I came here, five years ago.
We’re gonna drink everything that they have
Yeah. This adventure has finally paid off!
It’s gonna be more beautiful once we go insideee~
It’s basically a house that was scouted
For the actual filming and now it’s a coffee shop.
So when you’re at the place, don’t be fooled
There’s actually a second floor where we are right now.
There’s a floor above us as well.
You’re more excited than I am
I didn’t watch the whole drama
But you might remember it from
That scene in the drama when that guy
He’s name is who’s name I can’t remember
‘Cause I’m really bad with names
Was playing that piano and he was
Playing that song and
He called her to listen to that song
Remember the song, Simon?
nananana
You can’t sing with me, you sound terrible.
You should sit on the horses
And pretend that you have super fun!
I’m doing it!
If you watch the drama this is where
They put on the face masks together
That couple that was originally together
Who’s name I also can’t remember
But it was that other guy who was like:
And they did that here
And this is the famous chickens
Beware Onew!
Lemon cheejeu
Look’s like we’re having cake for lunch!
CAKE CAKE CAKE!
We finally made it!
Look at this gorgeous view behind us!
Of this gigantic mountain!
So I feel like for WANKS we usually have challenges
We just overcome the challenge
and we beat the curse.
That’s the challenge!
We’ve succeeded! No more challenges for today.
My challenge is, how many pieces of cake can I eat?
Okay, Martina’s gonna step in here
Simon’s like ”...92...~”
You gotta find the seat the closest
To the spot you want because
More than likely you’re not gonna come here
and find the perfect spot
And then you just keep your eyes peeled
and as soon as somebody moves,
You run up there and you just slowly
enter table by table until you get to
The spot that you want.
So I’m waiting for these two girls behind us.
No! We’re in a good spot right now.
You know why? Because tough trying
to say that
”Oh my god, is that all of Super Junior downstairs?”
Go away
Listen, this is the perfect spot
Because no one else can see the view
Behind us otherwise right?
Are you scooping them over the mountain?
I’m trying to like, fling them out.
It’s not working.
RUDE
So as you can see, we moved locations yet again.
This is our third seat and I think we
Got the keeper here today.
Yeah, we got the direct seat
For like the perfect view
There’s one more that’s a bit higher than us
But it’s not really worth it
We’re kind of eyeballing it upwards,
We’re just being greedy but that’s
The one we want, up there
We want those seats at the top there.
What’s really funny about this is that
We can also se other people doing the same thing.
With the battlefield manoeuvre.
And the people sitting behind us
They were actually sitting
All the other side of the window.
Why are we whispering?
But now they’re sitting here
I saw them run for the table also
It’s seriously really peaceful and
They’re eyeballing our seat but we’re not moving
We’re here ‘til the sun sets
Okay sun, make a faster set.
Come on hurry up
Hurry up! We’re waiting for you
Hurry up we’re getting cold
My balls are like:
ALL RIGHT ALL RIGHT
Switch information!
I’m gonna get a hot choco,
And you’re not invited
Get a cake for me too.
So I just discovered this map on the wall
Which apparently depicts exactly
How we got lost last time.
This is the 7022, 1020 or the 7212 bus
Which we took
So Simon and I are like:
”Bumbumbumbum My car’s name is Raff”
So we got off at the bus stop,
And we turned up here,
And we stopped for at the coffees shop
To get coffee, remember mountain coffee?
This is mountain coffee
It was uh, found on the side
Korean mountains provide coffee
And then we walked all the way up here
None of this is familiar at all
Up here
I don’t know what I’m doing
We went all the way up here
You are never ever planning a WANK again.
And then we came to here
And we decided that we shouldn’t
Go any further, and then we came
Into the woods.
That’s our theory, we’re gonna
Like shortcut through this place
Then we got all the way lost in here
Somewhere in like circles
And there’s the coffee shop right here
We were really close
We were like
That’s the bridge we were just on
But we still have no idea where we’re going
And then we somehow came up here
And we ended up over here
In the other area, We were so close
SO CLOSE
If we had just gone around
We would’ve made it all the way back there
Hot chocolates
We’re in the hover stage
We’re quivering sadly in an attempt
To try to stay warm
Save me hot choco
Next time I’m gonna smuggle
My own marshmallows, so that I can
Have like marshmallows prepared for myself
Because there’s a lack of marshmallows in this world.
Of all the issues that we have in this world
Lack of housing, lack of proper, minimum wages
Are you making fun of me?
The real problem that we have is
a shortness of marshmallows epidemic
I think we need to hurry up and drink this
And drive back, because if the sun sets
And it gets dark and we gotta drive back
You’re dead.
HUH With the big scary hell of doom
So that’s it for this week’s
Wonderful Adventure Now Korea
It was so wonderful
It finally worked out!
We broke the coffee prince curse.
I’m gonna take the correct street this time
Not like the evil street of doom
It’s a really beautiful view we highly
Recommend it, especially if you’ve seen the drama
It’s just a really nice place
And if you haven’t seen the drama
Just come anyways, because it’s just
gorgeous, really gorgeous.
I haven’t actually seen the whole drama,
But I still think it’s lovely.
It’s over!
Simon’s getting cupcakes
Happiness cupcakes, last time we
Got them because you were sad
Now now we’re getting them ‘cause we’re happy
CELEBRATORY CUPCAKES!
Oh, he’s got the bum-dancing going on!
What did they have?
They had a berry one, a love me one
and a raspberry choco.
FOR ME!
HEY
Not for you, you’re driving
EYES ON THE ROAD HANDS ON THE WEEL MISSY
